string-array.name: scenarios
string-array.item: "It could cause the very fabric of reality to be destroyed!"
"You will be mauled by a bear."
"You will be bitten by a shark."
"The earth will be destroyed."
"Facebook will become self-aware."
"You will be stabbed in the back."
"You will be bitten by a snake on a plane."
"You will be bitten by a zombie."
"You will spend the rest of your life shoveling snow."
"You will die of dysentery.
"Chuck Norris will roundhouse kick you."
"You will be run over by an 18-wheeler."
"You will be thrown out a window."
"You will spontaneously combust."
"You will be abducted by aliens."
"It will extinguish the sun."
"Your head will fall off."
"A rattlesnake will bite you."
"You will be struck by lightning."
"The building will collapse."
"You will be assassinated by a ninja."
"A pirate will steal all your booty."
"It will cause the next ice age."
"It will cause the nuclear holocaust"
"It will be the start of World War III."
